question:
Consider the following pairs:
  1. Indian Mirror
  2. Sambad Kaumudi
  3. Mirat-ul-Akbar
 Which of the above was/were founded and edited by Raja Ram Mohan Roy?
explanation: The fortnightly journal Indian Mirror was started by Keshab Chandra Sen in 1861. Mirat-ul-Akbar was a Persian language journal founded and edited by Raja Ram Mohan Roy. Sambad Kaumudi was a Bengali weekly newspaper published from Kolkata in the first half of the 19<sup>th</sup> century by Ram Mohan Roy.
